title: Powering Product Innovation: Q&A with MIT's Erdin Beshimov
author: Ms. Asha Rivers and Dr. Steven B. Goldman
summary: Discover how Erdin Beshimov, a lecturer at MIT & Senior Director of Experiential Learning at MIT Open Learning, is leading the way in product innovation through the Lead User Method. Learn more about his Powering Product Innovation course.

title: Realizing the Importance of Medical Electronic Devices
author: Kate S. Petersen | School of Engineering
summary: News Medical speaks to Brian Anthony, co-director of MITâ€™s Medical Electronic Device Realization Center, about the effect machine learning and sensor technologies have had on medical device engineering, as well as the Bioprocess Data Analytics and Machine Learning course he co-leads at MIT.

title: Why Businesses Must Untether Deep Learning
author: Vivienne Sze
summary: Deep learning only took a few years to make the leap from another theoretical piece of future-tech to a very real tool that's already making an impact on the business world.

title: Developing drones to address pandemic-related challenges in Scandinavia
summary: After meeting at MIT Professional Education's Advanced Study Program, three Norwegian students began working together on an autonomous drone startup to safely transport biological samples during the pandemic.
